00054 #define UNI_TYPE_UNKNOWN      0xFF
00055 #define UNI_TYPE_ASCII        0x00
00056 #define UNI_TYPE_UTF16LE      0x01 // unicode endianess known: little-endian
00057 #define UNI_TYPE_UTF16BE      0x02 // unicode endianess known: big-endian
00058 #define UNI_TYPE_UTF8         0x03
